name: Yushan Ventures
tag_list: startup-companies, taiwan, venture-capital, fundraising, business-development, diligence
overview:
We introduce selected startup companies in Taiwan and China to Venture Capitalists and Angel Investors to raise funding, we conduct due diligence and develop effective business plans. We work with selected startup companies to develop sales and business channels in Asia, Europe and the USA, utilizing online media, trade shows, industry conferences and social media.

The increasing number of startups being launched calls for the need to differentiate themselves, seek professional guidance and compete for funding and enter the global playing field at an early stage.

Services for Startup companies/Entrepreneurs

  • Fund raising
  • Identifying the “right” VC partner or Angel Investor
  • Structured Introductions to Venture Capitalists and Angels
  • Due diligence with thought leaders (professors, bloggers, executives in the ecosystem, media (e.g., Venturebeat), industry analysts
  • Business plan consulting
  • PR including placing speaking engagements at events
  • Representing our clients at key investment conferences (e.g., DEMO, LAUNCH)
  • Developing sales channels in Asia, Europe and the USA

Services for Angel Investors

  • Due diligence for Angel Investors who need more info on startups in Asia, USA or Europe
  • We pre-screen startup companies and only introduce the best to Angel Investors

Services for Venture Capitalists

  • We pre-screen startup companies and only introduce the best to VCs

Events

  • Co-hosting tech networking events in Taiwan, (e.g., Mobile Mondays Taipei, SME Award Competition)
  • Representing our clients at key trade shows in the US or in Asia
